focusrangew: Approx. 1 ft. 8 in. (50 cm.) to infinity [T]
macromode: Approx. 0.4 in. (1 cm.) to infinity (wide-angle position)         (All distances measured from center of front surface of lens)
digitalzoom: Up to 4x (angle of view equivalent to that of approx.     480mm lens in 35mm [135] format)
aperture: Electronically-controlled small aperture (-1 AV), ND filter     (–2 AV) selection
lensconstruction: 12 elements in 10 groups (2 ED lens elements)
label1: Autofocus (AF) Focus-area selection Center Face priority Manual with 99 focus areas Subject tracking Target Finding AF
lensfocallength: 4.3-21.5mm (angle of view equivalent to that of     24-120mm lens in 35mm [135] format)
builtinflashcontrol: TTL auto flash with monitor preflashes
vibrationreduction: Combination of Lens-shift and Electronic VR     (still pictures)
